sqlMap.statement:
SELECT PRH.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK ,PRH.PRC_RULE_NM ,PRH.PRC_RULE_HDR_DESC_TXT ,PRH.PRC_RULE_HDR_CMNT_TXT ,PRH.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD ,PRH.PRC_RULE_CATG_CD ,PRH.APPLY_AUTO_FLG ,PRH.OVRD_FLG ,PRH.ACTV_FLG ,PRH.EFF_FROM_DT ,PRH.EFF_THRU_DT ,PRH.DEF_RULE_PRCD_NUM ,SUBSTR(PRH.EZINTIME, 1, 8) CRAT_DT ,CASE WHEN AP1.FIRST_NM IS NOT NULL THEN PRH.EZINUSERID || '(' || AP1.FIRST_NM || ' ' || AP1.LAST_NM || ')' ELSE PRH.EZINUSERID END CRAT_USR_NM ,SUBSTR(PRH.EZUPTIME, 1, 8) UPD_DT ,CASE WHEN AP2.FIRST_NM IS NOT NULL THEN PRH.EZUPUSERID || '(' || AP2.FIRST_NM || ' ' || AP2.LAST_NM || ')' ELSE PRH.EZUPUSERID END UPD_USR_NM ,PRH.EZUPTIME ,PRH.EZUPTIMEZONE ,PRH.PRC_RULE_ADJ_TP_CD ,PRH.PRC_RULE_MOD_TP_CD ,PRH.PRC_RULE_ADJ_LVL_CD ,PRP.PRC_RULE_PRCD_PK ,PRP.PRC_RULE_PRCD_GRP_NM
,PRH.PRC_GRP_TRX_TP_CD
FROM PRC_RULE_HDR PRH ,AUTH_PSN AP1 ,AUTH_PSN AP2 ,PRC_RULE_PRCD_DTL PRPD ,PRC_RULE_PRCD PRP WHERE PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRH.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #prcRuleHdrPk# AND PRH.PRC_RULE_COND_TP_CD = #prcRuleCondTpCd# AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AP1.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRH.EZCANCELFLAG = AP1.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND PRH.EZINUSERID = AP1.USR_NM(+) AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AP2.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRH.EZCANCELFLAG = AP2.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND PRH.EZUPUSERID = AP2.USR_NM(+) AND PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRPD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRH.EZCANCELFLAG = PRPD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND PRH.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = PRPD.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK(+) AND PRPD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PRPD.EZCANCELFLAG = PRP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND PRPD.PRC_RULE_PRCD_PK = PRP.PRC_RULE_PRCD_PK(+) AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DISTINCT PAC.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM ,PAC.PRC_RULE_ATTRB_CD ,PAC.INP_REQ_FLG ,IOT.INP_OBJ_TP_DESC_TXT ,PAC.PRC_ADJ_COND_PK ,PAC.EZUPTIME ,PAC.EZUPTIMEZONE FROM PRC_ADJ_COND PAC ,PRC_RULE_ATTRB PRA ,INP_OBJ_TP IOT WHERE PAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PAC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PAC.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #prcRuleHdrPk# AND PAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRA.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PAC.PRC_RULE_ATTRB_CD = PRA.PRC_RULE_ATTRB_CD AND PRA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IOT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IOT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRA.INP_OBJ_TP_CD = IOT.INP_OBJ_TP_CD ORDER BY PRC_RULE_COND_NUM

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRC_ADJ_DTL PAD WHERE PAD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PAD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PAD.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #prcRuleHdrPk#
AND PAD.PRNT_PRC_ADJ_DTL_PK IS NULL
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_04 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_04#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_05 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_05#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PRC_GRP PG WHERE PG.PRC_GRP_PK = PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_05 AND UPPER(PG.PRC_GRP_NM) LIKE UPPER(#prcGrpNm_05#) AND PG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' )
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_06 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_06#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_07 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_07#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PROD_CTRL PC WHERE PC.PROD_CTRL_CD = PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_07 AND UPPER(PC.PROD_CTRL_DESC_TXT) LIKE UPPER(#prodCtrlNm_07#) AND PC.MDSE_STRU_ELMNT_TP_CD = 'PL' AND PC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0')
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_08 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_08#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_09 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_09#
PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_10 LIKE #xxPrcQlfyValSrchTxtJ1[]#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ALL_MDSE_V AMV WHERE AMV.MDSE_CD = PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_10
UPPER(AMV.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT) LIKE UPPER(#xxPrcQlfyValSrchTxtJ2[]#)
AND AMV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AMV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0')
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_10 IN (SELECT AMV.MDSE_CD FROM ALL_MDSE_V AMV WHERE AMV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AMV.MNF_ITEM_CD LIKE #xxPrcQlfyValSrchTxtJ3[]#
AND AMV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0')
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_11 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_11#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_12 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_12#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_13 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_13#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_14 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_14#
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_15) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_AF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_15) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_AT#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_15) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_AF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_15) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_AT#)
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_16 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_16#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SELL_TO_CUST STC WHERE STC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_16 AND UPPER(STC.DS_ACCT_NM) LIKE UPPER(#billToAcctNm_16#) AND STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0')
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_17 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_17#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_18 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_18#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_19 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_19#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM COA_BR CB WHERE CB.COA_BR_CD = PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_19 AND UPPER(CB.COA_BR_DESC_TXT) LIKE UPPER(#coaBrDescTxt_19#) AND CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0')
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_20 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_20#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_21 >= #xxSvcCallDt_FF#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_21 <= #xxSvcCallDt_FT#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_21, #highValDt#) >= #xxSvcCallDt_TF#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_21, #highValDt#) <= #xxSvcCallDt_TT#
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_22) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_BF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_22) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_BT#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_22) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_BF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_22) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_BT#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_24) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_CF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_24) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_CT#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_24) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_CF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_24) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_CT#)
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_25 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_25#
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_26) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_DF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_26) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_DT#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_26) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_DF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_26) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_DT#)
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_27 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_27#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_28 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_28#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_29 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_29#
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_30) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_EF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_30) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_ET#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_30) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_EF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_30) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_ET#)
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_31 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_31#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_32 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_32#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PRC_CATG PC WHERE PC.PRC_CATG_CD = PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_32 AND UPPER(PC.PRC_CATG_NM) LIKE UPPER(#prcCatgNm_32#) AND PC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0')
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_33 >= #prcDt_FF#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_33 <= #prcDt_FT#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_33, #highValDt#) >= #prcDt_TF#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_33, #highValDt#) <= #prcDt_TT#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_34 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_34#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_35 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_35#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_36 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_36#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_37 >= #xxRqstDt_FF#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_37 <= #xxRqstDt_FT#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_37, #highValDt#) >= #xxRqstDt_TF#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_37, #highValDt#) <= #xxRqstDt_TT#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_38 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_38#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_39 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_39#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_40 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_40#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_41 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_41#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_42 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_42#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_44 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_44#
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_45) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_FF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_45) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_FT#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_45) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_FF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_45) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_FT#)
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_46 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_46#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_48 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_48#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_49 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_49#
PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_53 = #xxPrcQlfyValSrchTxt53[]#
PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_54 = #xxPrcQlfyValSrchTxtK1[]#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SELL_TO_CUST STC WHERE STC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_54
UPPER(STC.DS_ACCT_NM) LIKE UPPER(#xxPrcQlfyValSrchTxtK2[]#)
AND STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' )
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_55 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_55#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_56 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_56#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_57 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_57#
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_58) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_GF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_58) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_GT#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_58) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_GF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_58) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_GT#)
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_59 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_59#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_60 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_60#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_61 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_61#
AND PAD.PRC_FMLA_PK = #prcFmlaPk#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_DTL_RATE = #prcRuleDtlRate#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_DTL_TXT = #prcRuleDtlTxt#
AND PAD.EFF_FROM_DT >= #effFromDt_AF#
AND PAD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #effFromDt_AT#
AND NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) >= #effThruDt_AF#
AND NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) <= #effThruDt_AT#
AND PAD.EZINUSERID = #xxFullNm_PC#
AND PAD.EZINTIME >= #cratDt_BF#
AND PAD.EZINTIME <= #cratDt_BT# || #highValTm#
AND PAD.EZUPUSERID = #xxFullNm_PU#
AND PAD.EZUPTIME >= #lastUpdDt_CF#
AND PAD.EZUPTIME <= #lastUpdDt_CT# || #highValTm#
AND PAD.PRC_ADJ_DTL_PK = #prcAdjDtlPk#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_DTL_PK = #prcRuleDtlPk#
AND PAD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) >= #slsDt#
AND ( PAD.EFF_FROM_DT > #slsDt# OR NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) < #slsDt# )
AND ( ( PAD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) >= #slsDt# ) OR ( PAD.EFF_FROM_DT > #slsDt# OR NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) < #slsDt# ) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_04, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_04) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_04 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_05, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_05) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_05 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_06, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_06) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_06 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_07, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_07) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_07 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_08, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_08) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_08 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_09, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_09) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_09 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_10, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_10) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_10 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_11, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_11) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_11 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_12, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_12) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_12 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_13, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_13) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_13 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_14, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_14) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_14 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_15, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_15) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_15 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_15, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_15) AS PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_15 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_16, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_16) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_16 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_17, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_17) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_17 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_18, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_18) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_18 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_19, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_19) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_19 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_20, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_20) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_20 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_21, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_21) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_21 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_21, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_21) AS PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_21 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_22, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_22) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_22 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_22, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_22) AS PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_22 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_24, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_24) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_24 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_24, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_24) AS PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_24 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_25, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_25) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_25 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_26, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_26) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_26 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_26, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_26) AS PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_26 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_27, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_27) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_27 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_28, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_28) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_28 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_29, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_29) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_29 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_30, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_30) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_30 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_30, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_30) AS PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_30 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_31, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_31) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_31 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_32, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_32) AS PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_32 ,DECODE(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_33, '*', NULL, PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_33) AS AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_29 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_29#
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_30) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_EF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_30) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_ET#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_30) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_EF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_30) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_ET#)
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_31 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_31#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_32 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_32#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PRC_CATG PC WHERE PC.PRC_CATG_CD = PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_32 AND UPPER(PC.PRC_CATG_NM) LIKE UPPER(#prcCatgNm_32#) AND PC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0')
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_33 >= #prcDt_FF#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_33 <= #prcDt_FT#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_33, #highValDt#) >= #prcDt_TF#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_33, #highValDt#) <= #prcDt_TT#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_34 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_34#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_35 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_35#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_36 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_36#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_37 >= #xxRqstDt_FF#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_37 <= #xxRqstDt_FT#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_37, #highValDt#) >= #xxRqstDt_TF#
AND NVL(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_37, #highValDt#) <= #xxRqstDt_TT#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_38 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_38#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_39 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_39#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_40 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_40#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_41 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_41#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_42 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_42#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_44 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_44#
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_45) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_FF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_45) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_FT#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_45) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_FF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_45) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_FT#)
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_46 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_46#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_48 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_48#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_49 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_49#
PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_53 = #xxPrcQlfyValSrchTxt53[]#
PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_54 = #xxPrcQlfyValSrchTxtK1[]#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SELL_TO_CUST STC WHERE STC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_54
UPPER(STC.DS_ACCT_NM) LIKE UPPER(#xxPrcQlfyValSrchTxtK2[]#)
AND STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' )
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_55 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_55#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_56 = #prcRuleCondFromTxt_56#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_57 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_57#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_59 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_59#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_60 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_60#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_61 LIKE #prcRuleCondFromTxt_61#
AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM PRC_ADJ_DTL D WHERE PAD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PAD.EZCANCELFLAG = D.EZCANCELFLAG AND PAD.PRC_ADJ_DTL_PK = D.PRNT_PRC_ADJ_DTL_PK
AND TO_NUMBER(D.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_58) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_GF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(D.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT_58) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondFromTxt_GT#)
AND TO_NUMBER(D.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_58) >= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_GF#)
AND TO_NUMBER(D.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT_58) <= TO_NUMBER(#prcRuleCondThruTxt_GT#)
)
AND PAD.PRC_FMLA_PK = #prcFmlaPk#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_DTL_RATE = #prcRuleDtlRate#
AND PAD.PRC_RULE_DTL_TXT = #prcRuleDtlTxt#
AND PAD.EFF_FROM_DT >= #effFromDt_AF#
AND PAD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #effFromDt_AT#
AND NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) >= #effThruDt_AF#
AND NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) <= #effThruDt_AT#
AND PAD.EZINUSERID = #xxFullNm_PC#
AND PAD.EZINTIME >= #cratDt_BF#
AND PAD.EZINTIME <= #cratDt_BT# || #highValTm#
AND PAD.EZUPUSERID = #xxFullNm_PU#
AND PAD.EZUPTIME >= #lastUpdDt_CF#
AND PAD.EZUPTIME <= #lastUpdDt_CT# || #highValTm#
AND PAD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) >= #slsDt#
AND ( PAD.EFF_FROM_DT > #slsDt# OR NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) < #slsDt# )
AND ( ( PAD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) >= #slsDt# ) OR ( PAD.EFF_FROM_DT > #slsDt# OR NVL(PAD.EFF_THRU_DT, #highValDt#) < #slsDt# ) )
AND PAD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PAD.EZCANCELFLAG = SCP.EZCANCELFLAG AND PAD.PRC_RULE_DTL_PK = SCP.PRC_RULE_DTL_PK ORDER BY PAD.PRNT_PRC_ADJ_DTL_PK ,TO_NUMBER(QTY_DISC_DTL_QTY) ) TBL WHERE ROWNUM <= #rowNum#

SELECT PRA.PRC_RULE_ATTRB_CD ,PRA.PRC_RULE_ATTRB_DESC_TXT ,PRA.INP_OBJ_TP_CD ,PRA.MOD_FLD_FLG ,IOT.INP_OBJ_TP_DESC_TXT FROM PRC_RULE_ATTRB PRA ,INP_OBJ_TP IOT WHERE PRA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRA.PRC_ADJ_DISP_FLG = #prcAdjDispFlg# AND PRA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IOT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IOT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IOT.INP_OBJ_TP_CD = PRA.INP_OBJ_TP_CD ORDER BY PRA.PRC_RULE_ATTRB_SORT_NUM
SELECT PRC.DEF_RULE_PRCD_NUM FROM PRC_RULE_CATG PRC WHERE PRC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRC.PRC_RULE_CATG_CD = #prcRulecatgCd#

SELECT 'Y' EXIST_FLG FROM PRC_RULE_HDR PRH WHERE PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND PRH.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK <> #prcRuleHdrPk#
AND PRH.PRC_RULE_NM = #prcRuleNm#

SELECT 'Y' EXIST_FLG FROM PRC_RULE_CMBN_EXCL PRCE WHERE PRCE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRCE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRCE.PRC_RULE_MOD_TP_CD IN (#prcRuleModTpCd#, #all#) AND PRCE.PRC_RULE_ADJ_TP_CD IN (#prcRuleAdjTpCd#, #all#) AND PRCE.PRC_RULE_ADJ_LVL_CD IN (#prcRuleAdjLvlCd#, #all#) AND PRCE.PRC_RULE_ATTRB_CD IN (#prcRuleAttrbCd#, #all#)
AND PRCE.PRC_FMLA_TP_CD IN (#prcFmlaTpCd#, #all#)
AND PRCE.PRC_FMLA_TP_CD IN (#all#)
AND PRCE.PRC_FUNC_TP_CD IN (#prcFuncTpCd#, #all#)
AND PRCE.PRC_FUNC_TP_CD IN (#all#)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRC_ADJ_DTL PAD WHERE PAD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PAD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PAD.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #prcRuleHdrPk# AND ( PAD.PRC_FMLA_PK IS NOT NULL OR PAD.PRC_RULE_DTL_RATE IS NOT NULL OR PAD.PRC_RULE_DTL_TXT IS NOT NULL )

SELECT PAD.PRC_ADJ_DTL_PK ,PAD.EZUPTIME ,PAD.EZUPTIMEZONE ,SCP.SPEC_COND_PRC_PK ,SCP.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME_SPEC_COND_PRC ,SCP.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE_SPEC_COND_PRC FROM PRC_ADJ_DTL PAD ,SPEC_COND_PRC SCP WHERE PAD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PAD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PAD.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #prcRuleHdrPk# AND PAD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND PAD.EZCANCELFLAG = SCP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND PAD.PRC_RULE_DTL_PK = SCP.PRC_RULE_DTL_PK(+)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRC_RULE_HDR PRH WHERE PRH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRH.DEF_RULE_PRCD_NUM = #defRulePrcd# AND PRH.ACTV_FLG = #actvFlg#
SELECT AMV.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,AMV.MNF_ITEM_CD FROM ALL_MDSE_V AMV WHERE AMV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AMV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AMV.MDSE_CD = #mdseCd#
SELECT MDSE.MDSE_CD ,MDSE.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT FROM MDSE MDSE WHERE MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MDSE.MNF_ITEM_CD = #mnfItemCd# AND MDSE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MDSE.RGTN_STS_CD = #rgtnStsCd#
SELECT $colNm$ GET_COLUMN FROM $tblNm$ A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.$whereCol$ = #whereVal#
SELECT PAC.PRC_ADJ_COND_PK , PAC.EZUPTIME , PAC.EZUPTIMEZONE FROM PRC_ADJ_COND PAC WHERE PAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PAC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PAC.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #prcRuleHdrPk#
